code: export var getPrice=function getPrice(price,size){switch(size){case 0:default:return price;case 1:return price+1.5;case 2:return price+4;}};export var getMyOrder=function getMyOrder(items){var order=[];Object.values(items).map(function(_ref){var items=_ref.items;items.map(function(pizza){order.push("Pizza ".concat(pizza.name,": size ").concat(pizza.size));});});return order.join("; ");};
